name: querido-diario-toolbox
description: Python module to perform text extraction, processing, and analysis of local government gazettes in Brazil. Built for improving government transparency through automated document processing.

name: keywordextraction
description: Python module to perform keyword extraction from any text document using TF-IDF, WordRank, and Word Embedding methods. Designed for automated document analysis and summarization.

name: textfind
description: Stata command to do descriptive analysis of keywords in text documents. Enables researchers to perform comprehensive text analysis within the Stata environment.

name: emailToEvent
description: AppleScript program to create iCal events from Outlook and Mail in macOS devices. Streamlines calendar management by automatically converting emails to calendar events.
